statements: DELETE FROM training_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND training_name = 'SQL Fundamentals';
DELETE FROM training_reports WHERE training_date = '2022-10-15' AND roi < 0.5;
DELETE FROM training_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND trainer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM roi_data WHERE report_id = 200 AND roi_percentage > 0.5;
DELETE FROM training_results WHERE training_id = 201 AND assessment_score < 70
DELETE FROM training_participants WHERE participant_id = 101 AND training_id = 201;
DELETE FROM training_results WHERE training_id = 201 AND completion_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_feedback WHERE rating < 3 OR cost_id = (SELECT MAX(cost_id) FROM training_costs);
DELETE FROM courses WHERE category = 'Programming' AND duration_hours < 10;
